import React from 'react' import {Card ,CardActions , CardContent, CardMedia,Button,Typography} from '@material-ui/core' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import {Consumer} from '../../context' export default function Posts({post}) { const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')) return ( {value=>{ const {showupdate,likepost,deletepost}=value return(
{post.title}

{post.message}

  • {post.tags.map(res=>"#"+res)}
{(user?.googleId==post?.creator || user?._id==post?.creator) && ( () )}
)} } ) }
